lines: 1. Ng`a mowinjo dwond Ruoth, oneg` oyie;Oland wachne mondo ji duto winje;Wachne mond` odhiyo e pinje duto;Ng`a mowinjo dwonde, bi.
Ka ng`ato winjo, ka ng`ato winjo,Ni mond` okow wachne nyaka giko piny;Wuonwa ma Jahera e maluongowa;Ng`a moyie mondo obi.
2. "Ng`a mobiro ira," Yesu wacho,"Kik odeki to mondo obi piyo.An e Yo, Adiera, kendo an Ngima;Ng`a mowinjo dwonda, bi."
3. Ng`a madwaro chutho, osesingone,Ng`a mobiro piyo ok nodog nono;Ng`a madwaro chutho, noyudi ngima;Ng`a moyie mondo, obi.
